mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrIssuCpn Generator(Generator) 2018-06-28 */ MBR_CPN_NO , MBR_NO , CPN_TP_CD , CPN_STAT_CD , CPN_PUBLI_DT , VALID_BEG_DATE , VALID_END_DATE , CPN_USE_DT , ORD_NO , CLM_NO , PRM_NO , CPN_CRTFC_CD , ISSU_ADMIN_ID , CPN_USE_IMPS_RESN_DSCR , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_ISSU_CPN WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_CPN_NO = #{mbrCpnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteMbrIssuCpn Generator(Generator) 2018-06-28 */ FROM MBR_ISSU_CPN WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_CPN_NO = #{mbrCpnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
